stimulusHtml: A sphere is expanding in such a way that the area of any circular cross section through the sphere’s center is increasing at a constant rate of 2 c m 2 /sec MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F85@ . At the instant when the radius of the sphere is 4 centimeters, what is the rate of change of the sphere’s volume? (The volume V of a sphere with radius r is given by V= 4 3 π r 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D7B@ .)
